overview: Collin lives a simple, disillusioned life as a small-town’s only mechanic. Gay and closeted, his world completely shifts when Roman, the lead singer of touring punk group ‘Antique Failure,’ comes to Collin for help on his broken-down van. The attraction is instant, but in fear of his small, conservative community, Collin must decide between keeping safe, or taking his only chance at love.
title: Antique Failure
